Class ToStringFunction.Arrays

    ToStringFunction.Arrays.ViewRange
    Parameter class that will define the sub-view of the E[] array to be transformed into a String.

  • Method Details

    • toStringArray

      public static <E> String[] toStringArray​(E[] source, ToStringFunction<E> map)
      Maps an array to a String array.
      Parameters:
      source - the source array.
      map - the function to be applied to each element.

    • toStringArray

      public static <E> String[] toStringArray​(E[] source) throws NullPointerException
      Maps an array to a String by applying Object.toString() on each element.
      Parameters:
      source - the source array.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(E[] source, int from, int to)
      Formats a source array to a String following the convention specified at Arrays.toString(Object[])
      Parameters:
      source - the array to be mapped.
      from - = the index to begin the formatting (inclusive)
      to - = the index to end (non-inclusive).

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(E[] es, ToStringFunction.Arrays.ViewRange range)
      Default implementation of toString(Object[], int, int) where both parameters 'from' and 'to' have been replaced by ToStringFunction.Arrays.ViewRange
      See Also:
      ToStringFunction.Arrays.ViewRange

    • toString

      public static String toString​(String[] strings, int from, int to)

    • toString

      public static String toString​(String[] strings, String join)
      Default implementation of toString(Object[], String, int, int)

      where:

      • from = 0
      • to = length

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(E[] source, ToStringFunction<E> map, int from, int to)
      Formats a source array to a String by applying a ToStringFunction on each element and following the convention specified at Arrays.toString(Object[])
      Parameters:
      source - the array to be mapped.
      map - the mapping function
      from - the index to begin the formatting (inclusive)
      to - the index to end (non-inclusive).

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(String prefix, E[] es, String join, ToStringFunction<E> map, int from, int to)
      Parameters:
      to - = non-inclusive
      prefix - will be appended BEFORE the first left

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(String prefix, E[] source, String join, String suffix, ToStringFunction<E> map, int from, int to)
      Formats a source array to a String by applying a ToStringFunction on each element and following the convention:

      'prefix' + map.apply(firstElement) + 'join' + map.apply(secondElement) + 'join' + ... + map.apply(finalElement) + 'suffix';

      Parameters:
      source - the array to be mapped.
      map - the mapping function
      from - the index to begin the formatting (inclusive)
      to - the index to end (non-inclusive).

    • toString

      public static <E> String toString​(String prefix, E[] source, String join, String suffix, int from, int to)
      Formats a source array to a String by applying an inlined String.valueOf(Object) following the convention:

      'prefix' + map.apply(firstElement) + 'join' + map.apply(secondElement) + 'join' + ... + map.apply(finalElement) + 'suffix';

      Parameters:
      source - the array to be mapped.
      from - the index to begin the formatting (inclusive)
      to - the index to end (non-inclusive).
